Articles.Content: So for my Project Genesis mission to Duna theres a bit in the plan I can't get my head around, the lander, It can't be at the front of the ship because the command bridge will be there, it can't be at the back because of propulsion unit, and it can't be inline because undocking it would require reassembly of the vessel which I'm too terrible with RCS to do, and it's just too complicated. So I'd love it for somebody to make a Duna lander that can easily come back up to the main vessel and rendezvous and dock, and preferably but not required to come down with parachutes mainly or only. I'd like it to be manned and have a good amount of science to use, as well as maybe a Rover and definately electricity generation and storage. As many things for a science expedition to land on Duna and come back as you can! And a side note, please tell me how I would have this on the vessel. Thanks loads.
My suggestion is to stow it in a cargo bay. This is an easy request. Canberra Corporation would be happy to Fulfill this.

Thanks, the mission will have a crew of 6 - 2 scientists, 2 pilots, and 2 engineers, I plan to take 2 pilots down, 2 engineers and 1 scientist, but I'd be happy with room for just 4, put 5 is preffered. Thanks again.
